display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

[media]
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

[media]
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

[media]
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.

# **Fight the Undead**
Undead Quest is a VR rogue-lite wave shooter. Hit, dodge, and slash your way through thousands of fun-filled undead foes.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_751061897295113_399559700241501768_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ZSBcJfL7IhcQ7kNvwEVYmfF&_nc_oc=AdkjH0a2LUP478r-9E1bVKaCiXwPS2lujCBT5zW8Vbh-TIgRkmE3oxBK2-6D8GS3A-0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=NQ1lJT3pM8TxbvEIr97p7Q&oh=00_AfsGmf9c66hNUsOXkEDAnSa_y2sqaiAvkRMICbDwha3jNw&oe=698EB819)
# **Hit, Dodge, Slash, Repeat**
Your primary weapons are a bat and a magic ball. Master your skills and kill the undead from a distance or use the environment to make a combo kill.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491823763_4154099168195233_6412607577589191733_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=yHDvDvqzjZMQ7kNvwGaxWrx&_nc_oc=AdkD8sQLPsCM0i0P4NFKrcmahkpf3nXwp7NzLZYjQ3Ii5SBd9nqTcbv-i5bISRFuGFo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=NQ1lJT3pM8TxbvEIr97p7Q&oh=00_AfsDjb-xqsS_gUKtqr2VNi1FjY5D0J_2-jlzkDSDjRrf8w&oe=698E989E)
# **Upgrade and Build Ultimate Skillset** 
Collect the points and choose from dozens of available upgrades - augment your ball with devastating powers.

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491820987_1099167878797501_6609429194438124224_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=OkzG3OcAZT8Q7kNvwHL02PK&_nc_oc=Adn1VHRRz5HpRU8LJ9sZBYOzn0G8aKXHq9E5HdR-7VVbzcmWvUUPNBdTKhI6xSoCYWc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=NQ1lJT3pM8TxbvEIr97p7Q&oh=00_AfutoIwx7IFyEx4ajdCwrTunrh1KpEgZ_PEc4oewYEccOw&oe=698EB14A)
# **One More Run**
Uncover the mystery of the undead by completing the story mode or see how long you can survive in survival mode. The game sessions are roguelite-inspired, so each playthrough and skill set you create will be unique.
